import sys
import json
import requests
import os
from configobj import ConfigObj

true = True
false = False
null = None

sys.path.insert(0,AVX::HELPER)
sys.path.insert(0,AVX::DEPENDENCIES)

import logger_util
logger = logger_util.get_logger('Certificate Renew OOB - Save CA Connector Info')

requests.packages.urllib3.disable_warnings()

group_name = '<%assign_group%>'

def fetch_gateway_key():
    conf_content = {}
    abs_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
    prop_file_path = abs_path + "/../properties/appviewx.properties"
    config = ConfigObj(prop_file_path)
    return config['GATEWAY_BASE_URL'], config['GATEWAY_KEY']


def get_ca_connector_info(uuid):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-connectorinfo-getbycertuuid?certificateUuid={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, uuid, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.get(url, headers = headers, verify = False)
    response = response.json().get('response')
    logger.info("Get CA Connector Info:"+str(response))
    return response


def save_ca_connector(old_connector_info, csrParameters):
    payload = {}
    ca_connector_info = {}
    ca_connector_info['_id'] = old_connector_info['_id']
    ca_connector_info['certificateUuid'] = old_connector_info['certificateUuid']
    ca_connector_info['existingUuid'] = ""
    ca_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] = old_connector_info['certificateAuthority']
    ca_connector_info['isAutoRenewal'] = old_connector_info['isAutoRenewal']
    ca_connector_info['renewBefore'] = old_connector_info['renewBefore']
    ca_connector_info['regenerateBeforeInDays'] = old_connector_info['regenerateBeforeInDays']
    ca_connector_info['autoRegenerateEnabled'] = old_connector_info['autoRegenerateEnabled']
    if old_connector_info['caSettingName'] == "":
        ca_connector_info['caSettingName'] = get_ca_setting_name(old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'], group_name, csrParameters['certificateCategories'][0])
    else:
        ca_connector_info['caSettingName'] = old_connector_info['caSettingName']
    ca_connector_info['divisionId'] = old_connector_info['divisionId']
    ca_connector_info['certificateType'] = old_connector_info['certificateType']
    ca_connector_info['name'] = old_connector_info['name']
    ca_connector_info['description'] = old_connector_info['description']
    ca_connector_info['csrParameters'] = csrParameters
    ca_connector_info['certAttributes'] = old_connector_info['certAttributes']
    ca_connector_info['genericFields'] = old_connector_info['genericFields']
    ca_connector_info['vendorSpecificDetails'] = old_connector_info['vendorSpecificDetails']
    ca_connector_info['validityInDays'] = old_connector_info['validityInDays']
    payload['csrGenerationSource'] = "Use existing CSR"
    payload['caConnectorInfo'] = ca_connector_info
    payload['certificateGroup'] = {"name":group_name}
    payload['fileIds'] = []
    payload = {"payload":payload}
    logger.info("Save CA Connector Payload:"+json.dumps(payload))
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-connectorinfo-save?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data = json.dumps(payload), verify = False)
    logger.info("Save CA Connector Info Response:"+str(response.json()))
    status = True
    if response.status_code != 200:
        AVX::LOG("Save CA connector failed.")
        return False
    else:
        AVX::LOG("CA connector saved Successfully.")
        return status


def get_ca_setting_name(cert_authority, cert_group, cert_category):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-settings-getbycaname?certificateAuthority={}&certificateCategory={}&certificateGroup={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, cert_authority, cert_category, cert_group, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.get(url, headers = headers, verify = False)
    response = response.json().get('response')
    return response[0].get('name')
    

def trigger_reissue(uuid, comments, common_name):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-lifecycle?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    payload_data = {"payload": {"action":"Reissue","certificateUuid":uuid,"comments":"","reason":comments}}
    logger.info("Trigger Reissue payload:"+str(payload_data))
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data = json.dumps(payload_data), verify = False)
    logger.info("Trigger reissue response:"+str(response.json()))
    status = True
    if response.status_code != 200:
        logger.info("Error msg: "+str(response.json().get('message')))
        AVX::LOG("Cert reissue trigger failed for "+common_name)
        AVX::LOG("Error Message: "+str(response.json().get('message')))
        return False
    else:
        AVX::LOG("Certificate Reissue Triggered Successfully for "+common_name)
        return status


def trigger_cert_push_api(vendor_connector_id):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-vendor-connector-push-to-device?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    payload = {"payload": {"vendorConnectorId":vendor_connector_id,"comments":""}}
    logger.info("Push to device payload:"+str(payload))
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data = json.dumps(payload), verify = False)    
    if response.status_code == 200:
        logger.info("Push to device response"+str(response.json()))
        logger.info('-------- Cert Push to device triggered successfully. --------')
        return True
    else:
        logger.info('----- Cert Push to device trigger failed. ------')
        logger.info("Push to device response"+str(response.json()))
        AVX::LOG("Push to device failure message:"+str(response.json().get('message')))
        return False



if __name__ == "__main__":
    reissue_cert_details = <%reissue_cert_details%>
    status = False
    comments = ""
    for reissue_cert in reissue_cert_details:
        common_name = reissue_cert['reissue_cn']
        uuid = reissue_cert['reissue_uuid']
        reissue_hash_fun = reissue_cert['reissue_hash_fun']
        reissue_key_bit = reissue_cert['reissue_key_bit'].split('-')
        reissue_key_type = reissue_key_bit[0].strip()
        reissue_bit_len = reissue_key_bit[1].strip()
        ca_connector_info = get_ca_connector_info(uuid)
        csrParameters = ca_connector_info['csrParameters']
        csrParameters['bitLength'] = reissue_bit_len
        csrParameters['keyType'] = reissue_key_type
        csrParameters['hashFunction'] = reissue_hash_fun
        save_status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, csrParameters)
        logger.info("Save status:"+str(save_status))
        if save_status:
            comments = reissue_cert['reissue_comments']
            reissue_status = trigger_reissue(uuid, comments, common_name)
            status = trigger_cert_push_api(ca_connector_info["_id"])
    if status:
        AVX::OUTPUT({})
    else:
        AVX::OUTPUT({},2)

import json
import sys

if __name__ == "__main__":
    uuid = '<%uuid_list%>'[<%iter%>]
    CAs_to_save_conn_info = ["DigiCert", "Entrust", "Trustwave", "GlobalSign", "LetsEncrypt"]

def save_ca_connector(old_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity=0):
    logger.info("validity:"+validity)
    payload = {}
    ca_connector_info = {}
    ca_connector_info['_id'] = old_connector_info['_id']
    ca_connector_info['certificateUuid'] = old_connector_info['certificateUuid']
    ca_connector_info['existingUuid'] = ""
    ca_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] = old_connector_info['certificateAuthority']
    ca_connector_info['isAutoRenewal'] = old_connector_info['isAutoRenewal']
    ca_connector_info['renewBefore'] = old_connector_info['renewBefore']
    ca_connector_info['regenerateBeforeInDays'] = old_connector_info['regenerateBeforeInDays']
    ca_connector_info['autoRegenerateEnabled'] = old_connector_info['autoRegenerateEnabled']
    ca_connector_info['caSettingName'] = old_connector_info['caSettingName']
    ca_connector_info['divisionId'] = old_connector_info['divisionId']
    ca_connector_info['certificateType'] = old_connector_info['certificateType']
    ca_connector_info['name'] = old_connector_info['name']
    ca_connector_info['description'] = old_connector_info['description']
    ca_connector_info['csrParameters'] = old_connector_info['csrParameters']
    ca_connector_info['certAttributes'] = old_connector_info['certAttributes']
    ca_connector_info['genericFields'] = old_connector_info['genericFields']
    ca_connector_info['vendorSpecificDetails'] = vendorSpecificDetails
    if old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] == 'DigiCert' or old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] == 'Trustwave':
        ca_connector_info['validityInDays'] = int(validity) * 365
    payload['csrGenerationSource'] = "Use existing CSR"
    payload['caConnectorInfo'] = ca_connector_info
    payload['certificateGroup'] = {"name":'<%cert_group%>'}
    payload['fileIds'] = []
    payload = {"payload":payload}
    logger.info("Payload:"+json.dumps(payload))
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-connectorinfo-save?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data = json.dumps(payload), verify = False)
    logger.info("Save CA Connector Info :"+str(dir(response)))
    logger.info("Save CA Connector Info Response:"+str(response))
    status = True
    if response.status_code != 200:
        return False
    return status



if __name__ == "__main__":
    uuid = '<%uuid_list%>'[<%iter%>]
    ca_connector_info = get_ca_connector_info(uuid)
    vendorSpecificDetails = {}
    status = False
    for cert in cert_details:
        if cert['uuid'] == uuid:
            if cert['ca'] == 'DigiCert':
                vendorSpecificDetails['orderId'] = cert['order_id_digicert']
                vendorSpecificDetails['caCertId'] = cert['ca_cert_id_digicert']
                vendorSpecificDetails['serverType'] = cert['server_type']
                validity = cert['validity_digicert']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Ejbca':
                vendorSpecificDetails['endEntityUserNameAttribute'] = cert['end_entity_user_name']
                vendorSpecificDetails['endEntityProfileName'] = cert['end_entity_profile_name']
                vendorSpecificDetails['issuerCommonName'] = cert['issuer_common_name']
                vendorSpecificDetails['certificateProfileName'] = cert['cert_profile_name']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Symantec':
                vendorSpecificDetails['serverType'] = cert['server_type']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'LetsEncrypt':
                validity = 90
                vendorSpecificDetails['challengeType'] = cert['challenge_type_letsencrypt']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Entrust':
                vendorSpecificDetails['orderId'] = cert['order_id_entrust']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Trustwave':
                logger.info("Cert_details:"+str(cert))
                vendorSpecificDetails['orderId'] = cert['cert_id_trustwave']
                validity = cert['validity_trustwave']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
    
    if status:
        AVX::OUTPUT({})
    else:
        AVX::OUTPUT({},2)

from configobj import ConfigObj

import logger_util
logger = logger_util.get_logger('Certificate Renew OOB - Save CA Connector Info')

requests.packages.urllib3.disable_warnings()

def fetch_gateway_key():
    conf_content = {}

    return config['GATEWAY_BASE_URL'], config['GATEWAY_KEY']


def get_ca_connector_info(uuid):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-connectorinfo-getbycertuuid?certificateUuid={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, uuid, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}

    response = response.json().get('response')
    logger.info("UUID:"+uuid)

def save_ca_connector(old_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity=0):
    payload = {}
    ca_connector_info = {}
    ca_connector_info['_id'] = old_connector_info['_id']
    ca_connector_info['certificateUuid'] = old_connector_info['certificateUuid']
    ca_connector_info['existingUuid'] = ""
    ca_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] = old_connector_info['certificateAuthority']
    ca_connector_info['isAutoRenewal'] = old_connector_info['isAutoRenewal']
    ca_connector_info['renewBefore'] = old_connector_info['renewBefore']
    ca_connector_info['regenerateBeforeInDays'] = old_connector_info['regenerateBeforeInDays']
    ca_connector_info['autoRegenerateEnabled'] = old_connector_info['autoRegenerateEnabled']
    if old_connector_info['caSettingName'] == "":
        ca_connector_info['caSettingName'] = get_ca_setting_name(old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'], group_name, old_connector_info['csrParameters']['certificateCategories'][0])
    else:
        ca_connector_info['caSettingName'] = old_connector_info['caSettingName']
    ca_connector_info['divisionId'] = old_connector_info['divisionId']
    ca_connector_info['certificateType'] = old_connector_info['certificateType']
    ca_connector_info['name'] = old_connector_info['name']
    ca_connector_info['description'] = old_connector_info['description']
    ca_connector_info['csrParameters'] = old_connector_info['csrParameters']
    ca_connector_info['certAttributes'] = old_connector_info['certAttributes']
    ca_connector_info['genericFields'] = old_connector_info['genericFields']
    ca_connector_info['vendorSpecificDetails'] = vendorSpecificDetails
    if old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] == 'DigiCert' or old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] == 'Trustwave' or old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] == 'EnTrust':
        ca_connector_info['validityInDays'] = int(validity) * 365
    elif old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] == 'LetsEncrypt' or old_connector_info['certificateAuthority'] == 'Symantec':
        ca_connector_info['validityInDays'] = validity
    payload['csrGenerationSource'] = "Use existing CSR"
    payload['caConnectorInfo'] = ca_connector_info
    payload['certificateGroup'] = {"name":group_name}
    payload['fileIds'] = []
    payload = {"payload":payload}
    logger.info("Save CA Connector Payload:"+json.dumps(payload))
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-connectorinfo-save?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data = json.dumps(payload), verify = False)
    logger.info("Save CA Connector Info Response:"+str(response))
    status = True
    if response.status_code != 200:
        return False
    return status

    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-settings-getbycaname?certificateAuthority={}&certificateCategory={}&certificateGroup={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, cert_authority, cert_category, cert_group, gateway_key)

    response = requests.get(url, headers = headers, verify = False)
    response = response.json().get('response')
    return response[0].get('name')

    ca_connector_info = get_ca_connector_info(uuid)
    vendorSpecificDetails = {}

    for cert in cert_details:
        if cert['uuid'] == uuid:

            if cert['ca'] == 'DigiCert':
                vendorSpecificDetails['orderId'] = cert['order_id_digicert']
                vendorSpecificDetails['caCertId'] = cert['ca_cert_id_digicert']
                vendorSpecificDetails['serverType'] = cert['server_type']
                validity = cert['validity_digicert']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Ejbca':
                vendorSpecificDetails['endEntityUserNameAttribute'] = cert['end_entity_user_name']
                vendorSpecificDetails['endEntityProfileName'] = cert['end_entity_profile_name']
                vendorSpecificDetails['issuerCommonName'] = cert['issuer_common_name']
                vendorSpecificDetails['certificateProfileName'] = cert['cert_profile_name']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Symantec':
                validity = 365
                vendorSpecificDetails['serverType'] = cert['server_type']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'LetsEncrypt':
                validity = 90
                vendorSpecificDetails['challengeType'] = cert['challenge_type_letsencrypt']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Entrust':
                validity = cert['validity_entrust']
                vendorSpecificDetails['orderId'] = cert['order_id_entrust']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails,validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Trustwave':
                logger.info("Cert_details:"+str(cert))
                vendorSpecificDetails['orderId'] = cert['cert_id_trustwave']
                validity = cert['validity_trustwave']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails, validity)
            elif cert['ca'] == 'Comodo Certificate Manager':
                logger.info("Cert_details:"+str(cert))
                vendorSpecificDetails['orderId'] = cert['cert_id_sectigo']
                vendorSpecificDetails['serverType'] = cert['server_type']
                status = save_ca_connector(ca_connector_info, vendorSpecificDetails)
    
    if status:

        logger.info(submit_csr_response)

        if submit_csr_response.get("response").get("viewResponse").get("message") == "Cert renewal triggered successfully.":
            logger.info('-------- Cert renewal triggered successfully. --------')
            AVX::LOG("Cert renewal triggered successfully.")
        else:
            logger.info('----- Cert renewal triggered failed. ------')
            logger.info(submit_csr_response.get("response").get("viewResponse").get("message"))
            AVX::LOG("Cert renewal triggered failed.")
    except:
        AVX::LOG("Cert renewal triggered failed.")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    uuid = '<%uuid_list%>'[<%iter%>]
    AVX::LOG("Triggering renew for certificate with uuid:"+uuid)
    trigger_renew_api(uuid)
    AVX::OUTPUT({})

import json

import csv
import requests

sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)

import appviewx
import logger_util
logger = logger_util.get_logger('Cert Expiry Report')

conn = appviewx.db_connection()
db = conn.appviewx

false = False
true = True
null = None

def write_file_to_appviewx(request_id, field_id, task_id, file_name):
   """
   Method to write the given file to /var/tmp in AppViewX
   :param db: Database connection object to AppViewX
   :param request_id: RequestID of the uploaded file
   :param field_id: FieldID of the uploaded file
   :param task_id: TaskID of the uploaded file
   :param file_name: Name of the uploaded file
   :return: Path of the uploaded file
   """
   with open(str(file_name), "wb") as obj_file:
       uploaded_file_id = str(db.visualworkflow_request_uploaded_files.files.\
           find_one({"metadata.requestId": request_id, \
           "metadata.fieldId": field_id, "metadata.taskId": task_id},\
            {"_id": 1})["_id"])
       gfs = gridfs.GridFS(db, collection="visualworkflow_request_uploaded_files")
       content = gfs.get(ObjectId(uploaded_file_id)).read()
       obj_file.write(content)
   return str(file_name)

def get_file(uploaded_file):
   """
   Method to get the metadata of the uploaded file from the database
   :param db: Database connection object to AppViewX
   :param uploaded_file: Name of the uploaded file
   :return: Path of the uploaded file
   """
   file_name = uploaded_file.get("fileName", "certificate_file.cer")
   request_id = uploaded_file["requestId"]
   field_id = uploaded_file["fieldId"]
   task_id = uploaded_file["taskId"]
   return write_file_to_appviewx(request_id, field_id, task_id, file_name)


def getCertificateGroup():
    """
    Function to Fetch the configured certificate group
    
    :return: Certificate policy
    """
    key = str()
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    cwd = os.getcwd()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-group-search?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}

    # payload = {"payload":{"log": True,"password": base64.b64encode(file_password.encode()).decode(),"uuId": cert_id}}

    payload = {"payload":{ "startIndex":0,"displayLength":100,"searchText":"","sortOrder":"asc","sortColumn":"name"}}
    
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    # logger.info("=========CertificateSearch==========")
    # AVX::LOG("=========CertificateSearch==========")
    # logger.info(response.text)
    # logger.info(response.reason)
    response = response.json()
    logger.info('--->'+str(response))
    # return type(response), type(response['response'])
    response = response.get("response").get("data")
    
    groups = []
    for cert_group in response:
        groups.append(cert_group.get("name"))
    
    AVX::LOG("Groups--->>"+str(groups))
    
    return groups

def fetch_gateway_key():
    '''
    fetch the gateway key from appviewx config file
    :return: appviewx gateway key
    '''
    conf_content = {}
    abs_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
    # logger.info('PATH')
    # logger.info(abs_path)
    prop_file_path = abs_path + "/../properties/appviewx.properties"
    prop_file = open(prop_file_path)
    prop_file_lines = prop_file.readlines()
    for line in prop_file_lines:
        if line is not "\n" and "GATEWAY_KEY" in line or "GATEWAY_BASE_URL" in line:
            conf_content[line.split("=")[0]] = line.split("=")[1].replace("\n", "")
    return conf_content['GATEWAY_BASE_URL'], conf_content['GATEWAY_KEY']
    prop_file.close()

if __name__ == "__main__":

import sys

def encrypt_password(password):
    '''
    The function encrypt_password is to encrypt the plain text password to encrypted password
    :param1 password (str): The password in plain text
    :return encrypted_pass (str): The encrypted password
    '''
    encrypted_pass = ""
    if password:
        enc_pass = base64.b64encode(password.encode("utf-8"))
        encrypted_pass = str(enc_pass,"utf-8")
        return encrypted_pass
    return ''


def fetch_gateway_key():
    '''
    The function is to get the gateway url and gateway key of the instance
    :return : Returns the gateway URL and gateway key
    '''
    conf_content = {}
    abs_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
    prop_file_path = abs_path + "/../properties/appviewx.properties"
    config = ConfigObj(prop_file_path)
    return config['GATEWAY_BASE_URL'], config['GATEWAY_KEY']

        	},

        		"name": "<%assign_group%>"
        	},

        }
    }
    
    logger.info("Full Response : Cert CA connector info " + str(payload))
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)

    logger.info('--->'+str(response))

    groups = []
    for cert_group in response:
        groups.append(cert_group.get("name"))
    
    return groups

def fetch_gateway_key():
    '''
    fetch the gateway key from appviewx config file
    :return: appviewx gateway key
    '''
    conf_content = {}
    abs_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
    # logger.info('PATH')
    # logger.info(abs_path)
    prop_file_path = abs_path + "/../properties/appviewx.properties"
    prop_file = open(prop_file_path)
    prop_file_lines = prop_file.readlines()
    for line in prop_file_lines:
        if line is not "\n" and "GATEWAY_KEY" in line or "GATEWAY_BASE_URL" in line:
            conf_content[line.split("=")[0]] = line.split("=")[1].replace("\n", "")
    return conf_content['GATEWAY_BASE_URL'], conf_content['GATEWAY_KEY']
    prop_file.close()

def encrypt_pass(password):
    '''
    The function encrypt_password is to encrypt the plain text password to encrypted password
    :param1 password (str): The password in plain text
    :return encrypted_pass (str): The encrypted password
    '''
    
    encrypted_pass = ""
    
    if password:
    	enc_pass = base64.b64encode(password.encode("utf-8"))
    	encrypted_pass = str(enc_pass,"utf-8")
    
    return encrypted_pass

def get_divisionId(group_name, ca_setting_name, ca_division):
    '''
    The function get_divisionId is to get the Division ID from Certificate Group,CA setting and CA division name
    :param1 group_name (str): Certificate group
    :param2 ca_setting_name (str): Certificate CA setting
    :param3 ca_division (str): Certificate CA division
    :return : Certificate CA division ID
    '''
    digicert_divisions = []
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-settings-getbycaname?certificateAuthority=DigiCert&certificateCategory=Server&certificateGroup={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(
    gateway_url, group_name, gateway_key)
    headers = {
        "sessionId": '<%sessionId%>',
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Accept": "application/json"
    }
    response = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, verify=False)
    response = response.json().get("response")
    for setting in response:
        if setting['name'] == ca_setting_name:
            cert_divisions = setting['rbacCertTypesHierarchy']['divisions']
            for div in cert_divisions:
                if div['name'] == ca_division:
                    return div['id']
                
    return ""
    

def trigger_regenerate_api(old_uuid, new_uuid):
    '''
    The function trigger_regenerate_api takes in the old_uuid and new_uuid and regenerates the Certificate
    :param old_uuid(str): Old uuid
    :param new_uuid(str): New uuid
    :return : Returns True if the Regenerate is successful else returns False
    '''
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-lifecycle?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    payload = {"payload": {"action":"Regenerate","certificateUuid":new_uuid,"sourceUuid":old_uuid,"comments":""}}
    logger.info("Regenerate payload:"+str(payload))
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data = json.dumps(payload), verify = False)    
    if response.status_code == 200:
        logger.info("Trigger regenerate response"+str(response.json()))
        logger.info('-------- Cert Submit triggered successfully. --------')
        AVX::LOG('Cert Regenerate triggered successfully.')
        return True
    else:
        logger.info('----- Cert Submit trigger failed. ------')
        logger.info("Trigger regenerate response"+str(response.json()))
        AVX::LOG("Regenerate failure message:"+str(response.json().get('message')))
        return False

        		"autoRegenerateEnabled": false if csr.get("regen_automatically") == "No" else true,
        		"regenerateBeforeInDays": csr.get("regen_before","0"),
                "caSettingName": csr.get("ca_account") or "",
                "divisionId": division_id or "",
                
                "certificateType": csr.get("cert_type") or "",
                "name": "DigiCert "+csr.get("cert_type")+" connector",
                "description": "",
                "file": "",
                "csrParameters": {
                    "commonName": csr.get("cert_cn"),
                    "subjectAlternativeNames": san,
                    "dNSNames": csr.get("dns") or "",
                    "iPAddresses": csr.get("ip_address") or "",
                    "organization": data.get('org') if data.get("org") else csr.get("org"),
                    "organizationUnit": data.get("org_unit") if data.get("org_unit") else csr.get("org_unit"),
                    "locality": data.get("locality") if data.get("locality") else csr.get("locality"),
                    "state": data.get("state") if data.get("state") else csr.get("state"),
                    "country": data.get("country") if data.get("country") else csr.get("country"),
                    "postalCode": csr.get("zip_code") or "",
                    "mailAddress": data.get("email") if data.get("email") else csr.get("email"),
                    "encryptedChallengePassword": encrypt_pass(csr.get("challenge_pwd")) or "",
                    "hashFunction": csr.get("hash_function"),
                    "keyType": csr.get("key_type_bit_len").split('-')[0].strip(),
                    "bitLength": csr.get("key_type_bit_len").split('-')[1].strip(),
                    "certificateCategories": certificateCategories,
                    "enhancedSANTypes": {
                        "dNSNames": san_dns,
                        "iPAddresses": csr.get("ip_address").split(",") if csr.get("ip_address") else [],
                        "rfc822Names": data.get("rfc822Names") if data.get("rfc822Names") else []
                    }
                },
                "certAttachments": {
                    "userDefinedFileName": "",
                    "comments": "",
                    "fileName": "",
                    "attachmentFile": ""
                },
                "certAttributes": {
                },
                "genericFields": {
                },
                "validityInDays": 365*int(csr.get("validity")),
                "vendorSpecificDetails": {
                    "orderId": "",
                    "caCertId": csr.get("ca_cert_id") or "",
                    "serverType": csr.get("server_type") or ""
                }
            },
            "certificateGroup": {
                "name": "<%assign_group%>"
            },
            "fileIds": []
        }
    }

    logger.info("Save CA Connector info payload:"+str(payload))
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    response = response.json().get("response")
    if response.status_code == 200:
        logger.info('-------- CA Connector save call successfull. --------')
        logger.info("Save CA Connector info response:"+str(response))
        response = response.json().get("response")
        AVX::LOG("CA connector saved successfully for "+str(response.get('commonName')))
        return True,response.get("uuid")
    else:
        logger.info('----- CA Connector save call failed. ------')
        logger.info("Save CA Connector info response:"+str(response))
        AVX::LOG("CSR Submission failure message:"+str(response.json().get('message')))
        return False,null
    

def check_strict_or_suggestive():
    """
    Function to Fetch the configured certificate group
    
    :return: "Strict" or "Suggestive"
    """
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    
    certificate_profile = 'server'
    if operation_type == 'Create':
        certificate_profile = str('<%certificate_profile%>').lower()
    else:
        certificate_profile = str('<%cert_profile_regen%>').lower()
        
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-get-policy-by-groupname?certificateGroupName={}&certificateCategory={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url,'<%assign_group%>', certificate_profile, gateway_key)

    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}
    response = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, verify=False)
    response = response.json()    
    return response.get("response").get("type")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    uuid_list = []
    status = True
    policy_type = check_strict_or_suggestive()
    if '<%csr_avx%>':
        for csr in <%csr_avx%>:
            division_id = get_divisionId("<%assign_group%>", csr.get("ca_account"), csr.get("ca_division"))
            if policy_type == "Strict":
                status, new_uuid = strict_cert_ca_connector_info(csr)
            else:
                status, new_uuid = cert_ca_connector_info(csr)
            if status:
                if operation_type == 'Create':
                    status = cert_submit_new_csr(new_uuid)
                else:
                    status = trigger_regenerate_api(csr.get('cert_uuid'),new_uuid)
            else:
                AVX::LOG("CSR Submission failed.")
    elif '<%csr_uploadcsr%>':
        for csr in <%csr_uploadcsr%>:
            division_id = get_divisionId("<%assign_group%>", csr.get("ca_account_uploadcsr"), csr.get("ca_division_uploadcsr"))
            if policy_type == "Strict":
                status, new_uuid = strict_cert_ca_connector_info(csr)
            else:
                status, new_uuid = cert_ca_connector_info(csr)
            if status:
                if operation_type == 'Create':
                    status = cert_submit_new_csr(new_uuid)
                else:
                    status = trigger_regenerate_api(csr.get('cert_uuid'),new_uuid)
            else:
                AVX::LOG("CSR Submission failed.")
    if status:
        AVX::OUTPUT({"uuid_list":uuid_list})
    else:
        AVX::LOG("CSR Submission failed.")
        AVX::OUTPUT({})

import json
import sys
import gridfs
from bson import ObjectId
import csv
import requests

sys.path.append(AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
sys.path.append(AVX::HELPER)

import appviewx
import logger_util
logger = logger_util.get_logger('Cert Expiry Report')

conn = appviewx.db_connection()
db = conn.appviewx

policy_type = ""

false = False
true = True
null = None

def write_file_to_appviewx(request_id, field_id, task_id, file_name):
   """
   Method to write the given file to /var/tmp in AppViewX
   :param db: Database connection object to AppViewX
   :param request_id: RequestID of the uploaded file
   :param field_id: FieldID of the uploaded file
   :param task_id: TaskID of the uploaded file
   :param file_name: Name of the uploaded file
   :return: Path of the uploaded file
   """
   with open(str(file_name), "wb") as obj_file:
       uploaded_file_id = str(db.visualworkflow_request_uploaded_files.files.\
           find_one({"metadata.requestId": request_id, \
           "metadata.fieldId": field_id, "metadata.taskId": task_id},\
            {"_id": 1})["_id"])
       gfs = gridfs.GridFS(db, collection="visualworkflow_request_uploaded_files")
       content = gfs.get(ObjectId(uploaded_file_id)).read()
       obj_file.write(content)
   return str(file_name)

def get_file(uploaded_file):
   """
   Method to get the metadata of the uploaded file from the database
   :param db: Database connection object to AppViewX
   :param uploaded_file: Name of the uploaded file
   :return: Path of the uploaded file
   """
   file_name = uploaded_file.get("fileName", "certificate_file.cer")
   request_id = uploaded_file["requestId"]
   field_id = uploaded_file["fieldId"]
   task_id = uploaded_file["taskId"]
   return write_file_to_appviewx(request_id, field_id, task_id, file_name)


def getCertificateGroup():
    """
    Function to Fetch the configured certificate group
    
    :return: Certificate policy
    """
    key = str()
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    cwd = os.getcwd()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-group-search?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}

    # payload = {"payload":{"log": True,"password": base64.b64encode(file_password.encode()).decode(),"uuId": cert_id}}

    payload = {"payload":{ "startIndex":0,"displayLength":100,"searchText":"","sortOrder":"asc","sortColumn":"name"}}
    
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    # logger.info("=========CertificateSearch==========")
    # AVX::LOG("=========CertificateSearch==========")
    # logger.info(response.text)
    # logger.info(response.reason)
    # logger.info(response.status_code)
    logger.info('response : '+str(response))
    response = response.json()
    logger.info('--->'+str(response))
    # return type(response), type(response['response'])
    response = response.get("response").get("data")
    
    groups = []
    for cert_group in response:
        groups.append(cert_group.get("name"))
    
    return groups

def fetch_gateway_key():
    '''
    fetch the gateway key from appviewx config file
    :return: appviewx gateway key
    '''
    conf_content = {}
    abs_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
    # logger.info('PATH')
    # logger.info(abs_path)
    prop_file_path = abs_path + "/../properties/appviewx.properties"
    prop_file = open(prop_file_path)
    prop_file_lines = prop_file.readlines()
    for line in prop_file_lines:
        if line is not "\n" and "GATEWAY_KEY" in line or "GATEWAY_BASE_URL" in line:
            conf_content[line.split("=")[0]] = line.split("=")[1].replace("\n", "")
    return conf_content['GATEWAY_BASE_URL'], conf_content['GATEWAY_KEY']
    prop_file.close()


def cert_ca_connector_info(csr):
    
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    cat = 'server'
    if '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Server':
        cat = 'server'
    elif '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Client':
        cat = 'client'
    elif '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Code Signing':
        cat = 'codeSigning'
        
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-get-policy-by-groupname?certificateGroupName={}&certificateCategory={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url,'<%assign_group%>', cat, gateway_key)

    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}
    response = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, verify=False)
    response = response.json()

    data = {}
    for cert_policy_ca_acc_detail in response.get("response").get("certificatePolicyCaAccountDetails"):
        if cert_policy_ca_acc_detail.get("certificateAuthority") == "<%cert_authority%>":
            csr_params = cert_policy_ca_acc_detail.get("certPolicyCsrParameter")
            data['cn'] = csr_params.get("commonName")
            data['dns'] = csr_params.get("subjectAlternativeNames")
            data['org'] = csr_params.get("organization")
            data['org_unit'] = csr_params.get('organizationUnit')
            data['locality'] = csr_params.get('locality')
            data['state'] = csr_params.get('state')
            data['country'] = csr_params.get('country')
            data['email'] = ','.join(csr_params.get('mailAddress'))
    

        
    dns_names = [] #csr[3].split(",").append(csr[1]) if csr[3] else [csr[1]]    
    
    
    # dns_names = data.get("common_name") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("common_name") else csr[1]
    if data.get("cn") and policy_type == "Strict":
        dns_names.append(data.get("cn"))
    else:
        dns_names.append(str(csr[1]))
    
    if data["dns"]:
        dns_names.extend(data["dns"])
    
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-connectorinfo-save?&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {
        "sessionId": '<%sessionId%>',
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Accept": "application/json"
    }
    san = ["dNSNames"]
    
    if csr[2]:
        san.append("directoryNames")
    if csr[4]:
        san.append("rfc822Names")
    if csr[5]:
        san.append("iPAddresses")
    if csr[6]:
        san.append("registeredIDs")
    if csr[7]:
        san.append("uniformResourceIdentifiers")
    if csr[8]:
        san.append("otherNames")
    
    payload = {
        "payload" : {
            "csrGenerationSource": "appviewx",
            "caConnectorInfo": {
                "_id": "",
                "certificateUuid": "",
                "existingUuid": "",
                "certificateAuthority": "Microsoft Enterprise",
                "isAutoRenewal": false,
        		"renewBefore": "0",
                "autoRegenerateEnabled": false,
                "regenerateBeforeInDays": "0",
                "caSettingName": csr[0],
                "certificateType": "",
                "name": str("<%cert_authority%>")+" CA connector",
                "description": "",
                "file": "",
                "csrParameters": {
                    "commonName": data.get("common_name") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("common_name") else csr[1],
                    "subjectAlternativeNames": san,
                    "directoryNames": csr[2] or "",
                    "dNSNames": ','.join(data.get("dns")) if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("dns") else csr[3],
                    "rfc822Names": csr[4] or "",
                    "iPAddresses": csr[5] or "",
                    "registeredIDs": csr[6] or "",
                    "uniformResourceIdentifiers": csr[7] or "",
                    "otherNames": csr[8] or "",
                    "organization": data.get("org") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("org") else csr[9],
                    "organizationUnit": data.get("org_unit") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("org_unit") else csr[10],
                    "locality": data.get("locality") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("locality") else csr[11],
                    "state": data.get("state") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("state") else csr[12],
                    "country": data.get("country") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("country") else csr[13],
                    "mailAddress": data.get("email") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("email") else csr[14],
                    "encryptedChallengePassword": "",
                    "hashFunction": csr[16],
                    "keyType": csr[17],
                    "bitLength": csr[18],
                    "postalCode": "",
                    "certificateCategories": ["<%certificate_profile%>", "Client"] if "<%certificate_profile%>" == "Server" else ["<%certificate_profile%>"],
                    "enhancedSANTypes": {
                        "directoryNames": csr[2].split(";") if csr[2] else [],
                        "dNSNames": dns_names,
                        "rfc822Names": csr[4].split(",") if csr[4] else [],
                        "iPAddresses": csr[5].split(",") if csr[5] else [],
                        "registeredIDs": csr[6].split(",") if csr[6] else [],
                        "uniformResourceIdentifiers": csr[7].split(",") if csr[7] else [],
                        "otherNames": csr[8].split(",") if csr[8] else []
                    }
                },
                "certAttachments": {
                    "userDefinedFileName": "",
                    "comments": "",
                    "fileName": "",
                    "attachmentFile": ""
                },
                "certAttributes": {
                },
                "genericFields": {
                },
                "vendorSpecificDetails": {
                    "templateName": csr[19]
                }
            },
            "certificateGroup": {
                "name": "<%assign_group%>"
            },
            "fileIds": []
        }
    }
    
    logger.info("Payload for CSR cert_ca_connector_info"+str(payload))
    # AVX::LOG("Payload-->>"+str(payload))
    
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    logger.info("Status code : "+str(response.status_code))
    logger.info("Response REASON : "+str(response.reason))
    logger.info("Response TEXT : "+str(response.text))

    logger.info("Response code : "+str(response))
    response = response.json().get("response")
    logger.info(response)
    AVX::LOG("Response-->>"+str(response))

    return response.get("uuid")

def check_strict_or_suggestive():
    """
    Function to Fetch the configured certificate group
    
    :return: "Strict" or "Suggestive"
    """
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    cat = 'server'
    if '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Server':
        cat = 'server'
    elif '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Client':
        cat = 'client'
    elif '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Code Signing':
        cat = 'codeSigning'
        
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-get-policy-by-groupname?certificateGroupName={}&certificateCategory={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url,'<%assign_group%>', cat, gateway_key)

    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}
    response = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, verify=False)
    response = response.json()
    # logger.info('&&&\n')
    # logger.info(str(response))
    
    return response.get("response").get("type")

def cert_submit_csr_hsv(uuid):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-submit-csr-hv?&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {
        "sessionId": '<%sessionId%>',
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Accept": "application/json"
    }
    payload =  {
        "payload":{
            "certificateUuid":uuid,
            "comments":"",
            "action":"Submit",
            "submit":true
        }
    }
    
    AVX::LOG('+++++++'+str(payload))
    logger.info('+++++++'+str(payload))
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    response = response.json()
    logger.info(response)
    return response

if __name__ == "__main__":
    
    certificate_group = getCertificateGroup()
    policy_type = check_strict_or_suggestive()
    if policy_type == "Strict":
        AVX::LOG(str("Since the policy associated with the group "+ "<%assign_group%>" +" is Strict. The CSR parameters associated with the policy has been taken."))
    AVX::LOG("CERT GROUP")
    AVX::LOG(str(certificate_group))
    a = '<%upload_csv%>'
    b = get_file('<%upload_csv%>')
    c = 1
    with open("sample.csv", 'r') as data_file:
        reader = csv.reader(data_file, delimiter='\n')
        for row in reader:
            if c == 1:
                c+=1
                continue
            AVX::LOG(str(row))
            AVX::LOG(str(type(row)))
            AVX::LOG(str(len(row)))
            csr = row[0].split(",")
            uuid = cert_ca_connector_info(csr)
            AVX::LOG("uuid : "+str(uuid))
            resp = cert_submit_csr_hsv(uuid)
            # fetch = cert_fetch(uuid)
            
    AVX::LOG(str(a))
    AVX::LOG(str(b))
    AVX::LOG(str(c))
    AVX::OUTPUT({})

import sys
import json
import requests
import ast
import os
from configobj import ConfigObj

sys.path.insert(0,AVX::HELPER)
sys.path.insert(0,AVX::DEPENDENCIES)
import logger_util

true = True
false = False
null = None

import base64
password = "<%challenge_password%>"

operation_type = '<%operation_type%>'
group_name = '<%assign_group%>'
cert_authority = "<%cert_authority%>"

encrypted_pass = ""

def encrypt_password(password):
    '''
    The function encrypt_password is to encrypt the plain text password to encrypted password
    :param1 password (str): The password in plain text
    :return encrypted_pass (str): The encrypted password
    '''
    if password:
        enc_pass = base64.b64encode(password.encode("utf-8"))
        encrypted_pass = str(enc_pass,"utf-8")
        return encrypted_pass
    return ''


logger = logger_util.get_logger('Create Microsoft Enterprise certificate')



def fetch_gateway_key():
    '''
    The function is to get the gateway url and gateway key of the instance
    '''
    conf_content = {}
    abs_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
    prop_file_path = abs_path + "/../properties/appviewx.properties"
    config = ConfigObj(prop_file_path)
    return config['GATEWAY_BASE_URL'], config['GATEWAY_KEY']


def cert_ca_connector_info(csr):
    '''
    The cert_ca_connector_info function takes in csr parameters and gives the UUID for submission of certificate
    params csr(dict): CSR parameters
    return (str): Returns UUID of the new certificates
    '''
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-connectorinfo-save?&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {
        "sessionId": '<%sessionId%>',
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Accept": "application/json"
    }

    san = ["dNSNames"]
    
    if csr.get("directory_name"):
        san.append("directoryNames")
    if csr.get("email_san"):
        san.append("rfc822Names")
    if csr.get("ip_address"):
        san.append("iPAddresses")
    if csr.get("registered_id_san"):
        san.append("registeredIDs")
    if csr.get("url_san"):
        san.append("uniformResourceIdentifiers")
    if csr.get("other_name_san"):
        san.append("otherNames")
    if len(san)>1:
        san.insert(0,"multiselect-all")
        
    san_dns = []
    
    if csr.get("dns"):
        san_dns.append(csr.get("common_name"))
        san_dns.extend(csr.get("dns").split(","))

    certificateCategories = ""
    if operation_type == 'Create':
        certificateCategories = ["<%certificate_profile%>", "Client"] if "<%certificate_profile%>" == "Server" else ["<%certificate_profile%>"]
    else:
        cert_profile = csr.get('cert_profile_regen')
        certificateCategories = [cert_profile, "Client"] if cert_profile == "Server" else [cert_profile]
    
    
    payload = {
        "payload" : {
            "csrGenerationSource": "appviewx",
            "caConnectorInfo": {
                "_id": "",
                "certificateUuid": "",
                "existingUuid": "",
                "certificateAuthority": "Microsoft Enterprise",
                "isAutoRenewal": true if csr.get("renew_auto")=="Yes" else false,
                "renewBefore":csr.get("start_renew") if csr.get("renew_auto") == "Yes" else "0",
                "autoRegenerateEnabled": true if csr.get("regen_auto")=="Yes" else false,
                "regenerateBeforeInDays": csr.get("start_regen") if csr.get("regen_auto") == "Yes" else "0",
                "caSettingName": csr.get("ca_account"),
                "certificateType": "",
                "name": cert_authority+" CA connector",
                "description": "",
                "file": "",
                "csrParameters": {
                    "commonName": csr.get("common_name"),
                    "subjectAlternativeNames": san,
                    "directoryNames": csr.get("directory_name"),
                    "dNSNames": csr.get("dns") or "",
                    "rfc822Names": csr.get("email_san") or "",
                    "iPAddresses": csr.get("ip_address_san") or "",
                    "registeredIDs": csr.get("registered_id_san"),
                    "uniformResourceIdentifiers": csr.get("url_san"),
                    "otherNames": csr.get("other_name_san"),
                    "organization": csr.get("org") or "",
                    "organizationUnit": csr.get("org_unit") or "",
                    "locality": csr.get("locality") or "",
                    "state": csr.get("state") or "",
                    "country": csr.get("country") or "",
                    "mailAddress": csr.get("email") or "",
                    "encryptedChallengePassword": encrypt_password(csr.get("confirm_pass")),
                    "hashFunction": csr.get("hash_function"),
                    "keyType": csr.get("key_type").split('-')[0].strip(),
                    "bitLength": csr.get("key_type").split('-')[1].strip(),
                    "postalCode": "",

def cert_submit_new_csr(uuid):

    The cert_submit_new_csr function takes in uuid for submission of certificate
    params uuid: uuid for submission of certificate
    return : Returns the response of the following API /cert-submit-csr-hv
    '''
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-submit-csr-hv?&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {
        "sessionId": '<%sessionId%>',
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Accept": "application/json"
    }
    payload =  {
        "payload":{
            "certificateUuid":uuid,
            "comments":"",
            "action":"Submit",
            "submit":true
        }
    }
    logger.info("Submit CSR payload:"+str(payload))
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    response = response.json()
    logger.info("Submit CSR response:"+str(response))
    return response


def check_strict_or_suggestive():
    """
    Function to Fetch the configured certificate group
    
    :return: "Strict" or "Suggestive"
    """
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    
    certificate_profile = 'server'
    if operation_type == 'Create':
        certificate_profile = str('<%certificate_profile%>').lower()
        if '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'CodeSigning':
            certificate_profile = 'CodeSigning'
    else:
        certificate_profile = str('<%cert_profile_regen%>').lower()
        if '<%cert_profile_regen%>' == 'CodeSigning':
            certificate_profile = 'CodeSigning'
        
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-get-policy-by-groupname?certificateGroupName={}&certificateCategory={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, group_name, certificate_profile, gateway_key)

    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}
    response = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, verify=False)
    response = response.json()
    logger.info("Get Policy by group name response:"+str(response))
    return response.get("response").get("type")

def trigger_regenerate_api(old_uuid, new_uuid):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-lifecycle?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    payload = {"payload": {"action":"Regenerate","certificateUuid":new_uuid,"sourceUuid":old_uuid,"comments":""}}
    logger.info("Regenerate payload:"+str(payload))
    headers = {"sessionId":'<%sessionId%>',"Content-Type": "application/json", "Accept": "application/json"}
    response = requests.post(url, headers = headers, data = json.dumps(payload), verify = False)    
    if response.status_code == 200:
        logger.info("Trigger regenerate response"+str(response.json()))
        logger.info('-------- Cert Submit triggered successfully. --------')
        AVX::LOG('Cert Regenerate triggered successfully.')
        return True
    else:
        logger.info('----- Cert Submit trigger failed. ------')
        logger.info("Trigger regenerate response"+str(response.json()))
        AVX::LOG("Regenerate failure message:"+str(response.json().get('message')))
        return False


if __name__ == "__main__":
    uuid_list = []
    policy_type = check_strict_or_suggestive()
    status = True
    if '<%csr_parameters%>':
        for csr in <%csr_parameters%>:
            if policy_type == "Strict":
                status, new_uuid = strict_cert_ca_connector_info(csr)
                AVX::LOG(str("Since the certificate policy is Strict, the certificate policy CSR parameters have been updated for the common name : ")+str(csr.get("common_name")))
            else:
                status, new_uuid = cert_ca_connector_info(csr)

            if status:
                if operation_type == 'Create':
                    status = cert_submit_new_csr(uuid)
                else:
                    status = trigger_regenerate_api(csr.get('cert_uuid'),new_uuid)
            else:
                AVX::LOG("CSR Submission Failed.")
    elif '<%read_only%>':
        for csr in <%read_only%>:
            if policy_type == "Strict":
                status, new_uuid = strict_cert_ca_connector_info_upload_csr(csr)
            else:
                status, new_uuid = cert_ca_connector_info_from_upload_csr(csr)

            if status:
                if operation_type == 'Create':
                    status = cert_submit_new_csr(uuid)
                else:
                    status = trigger_regenerate_api(csr.get('cert_uuid'),new_uuid)
            else:
                AVX::LOG("CSR Submission Failed.")
    if status:
        AVX::OUTPUT({"uuid_list":uuid_list})
    else:
        AVX::OUTPUT({})

def write_file_to_appviewx(request_id, field_id, task_id, file_name):
   """
   Method to write the given file to /var/tmp in AppViewX
   :param db: Database connection object to AppViewX
   :param request_id: RequestID of the uploaded file
   :param field_id: FieldID of the uploaded file
   :param task_id: TaskID of the uploaded file
   :param file_name: Name of the uploaded file
   :return: Path of the uploaded file
   """
   with open(str(file_name), "wb") as obj_file:
       uploaded_file_id = str(db.visualworkflow_request_uploaded_files.files.\
           find_one({"metadata.requestId": request_id, \
           "metadata.fieldId": field_id, "metadata.taskId": task_id},\
            {"_id": 1})["_id"])
       gfs = gridfs.GridFS(db, collection="visualworkflow_request_uploaded_files")
       content = gfs.get(ObjectId(uploaded_file_id)).read()
       obj_file.write(content)
   return str(file_name)

def get_file(uploaded_file):
   """
   Method to get the metadata of the uploaded file from the database
   :param db: Database connection object to AppViewX
   :param uploaded_file: Name of the uploaded file
   :return: Path of the uploaded file
   """
   file_name = uploaded_file.get("fileName", "certificate_file.cer")
   request_id = uploaded_file["requestId"]
   field_id = uploaded_file["fieldId"]
   task_id = uploaded_file["taskId"]
   return write_file_to_appviewx(request_id, field_id, task_id, file_name)


def getCertificateGroup():
    """
    Function to Fetch the configured certificate group
    
    :return: Certificate policy
    """
    key = str()
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    cwd = os.getcwd()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-group-search?gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}

    # payload = {"payload":{"log": True,"password": base64.b64encode(file_password.encode()).decode(),"uuId": cert_id}}

    payload = {"payload":{ "startIndex":0,"displayLength":100,"searchText":"","sortOrder":"asc","sortColumn":"name"}}
    
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    # logger.info("=========CertificateSearch==========")
    # AVX::LOG("=========CertificateSearch==========")
    # logger.info(response.text)
    # logger.info(response.reason)
    response = response.json()
    logger.info('--->'+str(response))
    # return type(response), type(response['response'])
    response = response.get("response").get("data")
    
    groups = []
    for cert_group in response:
        groups.append(cert_group.get("name"))
    
    return groups

def fetch_gateway_key():
    '''
    fetch the gateway key from appviewx config file
    :return: appviewx gateway key
    '''
    conf_content = {}
    abs_path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
    # logger.info('PATH')
    # logger.info(abs_path)
    prop_file_path = abs_path + "/../properties/appviewx.properties"
    prop_file = open(prop_file_path)
    prop_file_lines = prop_file.readlines()
    for line in prop_file_lines:
        if line is not "\n" and "GATEWAY_KEY" in line or "GATEWAY_BASE_URL" in line:
            conf_content[line.split("=")[0]] = line.split("=")[1].replace("\n", "")
    return conf_content['GATEWAY_BASE_URL'], conf_content['GATEWAY_KEY']
    prop_file.close()


def cert_ca_connector_info(csr):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    
    cat = 'server'
    if '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Server':
        cat = 'server'
    elif '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Client':
        cat = 'client'
    elif '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Code Signing':
        cat = 'codeSigning'
    
    
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-get-policy-by-groupname?certificateGroupName={}&certificateCategory={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url,'<%assign_group%>', cat, gateway_key)

    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}
    response = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, verify=False)
    response = response.json()

    data = {}
    for cert_policy_ca_acc_detail in response.get("response").get("certificatePolicyCaAccountDetails"):
        if cert_policy_ca_acc_detail.get("certificateAuthority") == "<%cert_authority%>":
            csr_params = cert_policy_ca_acc_detail.get("certPolicyCsrParameter")
            data['cn'] = csr_params.get("commonName")
            data['dns'] = csr_params.get("subjectAlternativeNames")
            data['org'] = csr_params.get("organization")
            data['org_unit'] = csr_params.get('organizationUnit')
            data['locality'] = csr_params.get('locality')
            data['state'] = csr_params.get('state')
            data['country'] = csr_params.get('country')
            data['email'] = ','.join(csr_params.get('mailAddress'))
    
    
    dns_names = []
    
    if data.get("cn") and policy_type == "Strict":
        dns_names.append(data.get("cn"))
    else:
        dns_names.append(str(csr[1]).split(",") if csr[1] else csr[1])
    
    if data["dns"]:
        dns_names.extend(data["dns"])
    
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-ca-connectorinfo-save?&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {
        "sessionId": '<%sessionId%>',
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Accept": "application/json"
    }
    
    san = []
    # ["multiselect-all", "dNSNames"].append("iPAddresses") if csr.get("ip_address") else ["multiselect-all", "dNSNames"]
    
    if csr[3]:
        san.append("multiselect-all")
        san.append("dNSNames")
    if csr[4]:
        san.append("iPAddresses")
    if not csr[3] and not csr[4]:
        san = null
    
    dns = list(csr[2].split(" ")) if csr[2] != '' else []
    dns_names = csr[3].split(",") if csr[3] != '' else []
    dns.extend(dns_names)
    
    payload = {
        "payload" : {
        	"csrGenerationSource": "appviewx",
        	"caConnectorInfo": {
        		"_id": "",
        		"certificateUuid": "",
        		"existingUuid": "",
        		"certificateAuthority": "<%cert_authority%>",
        		"isAutoRenewal": false,
        		"renewBefore":"0",
        		"autoRegenerateEnabled": false,
    			"regenerateBeforeInDays": "0",
        		"caSettingName": csr[0],

        		"certificateType": csr[1],
        		"name": "<%cert_authority%> "+csr[1]+" connector",
        		"description": "",
        		"file": "",
        		"csrParameters": {
        			"commonName": data.get("cn") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("cn") else csr[2],
        			"subjectAlternativeNames": san,
        			"dNSNames": ','.join(data.get("dns")) if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("dns") else csr[3],
        			"iPAddresses": csr[4],
        			"organization": data.get("org") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("org") else  csr[5],
        			"organizationUnit": data.get("org_unit") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("org_unit") else csr[6],
        			"streetAddress":csr[7],
        			"locality": data.get("locality") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("locality") else csr[8],
        			"state": data.get("state") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("state") else csr[9],
        			"country": data.get("country") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("country") else csr[10],
        			"postalCode": csr[11],
        			"mailAddress": data.get("email") if policy_type == "Strict" and data.get("email") else csr[12],
        			"encryptedChallengePassword": csr[14],
        			"hashFunction": csr[15],
        			"keyType": csr[16],
        			"bitLength": csr[17],
        			"certificateCategories": ["<%certificate_profile%>", "Client"] if "<%certificate_profile%>" == "Server" else ["<%certificate_profile%>"],
        			"enhancedSANTypes": {
        				"dNSNames": dns,
        				"iPAddresses": csr[4].split(",") if csr[4] else []
        			}
        		},
        		"certAttachments": {
        			"userDefinedFileName": "",
        			"comments": "",
        			"fileName": "",
        			"attachmentFile": ""
        		},
        		"certAttributes": {
        		},
        		"genericFields": {
        		},
        		"validityInDays": 365*int(csr[13]),
        		"vendorSpecificDetails": {
        		    "orderId": "",
		        	"serverType": csr[18] or ""
        		}
        	},
        	"certificateGroup": {
        		"name": "<%assign_group%>"
        	},
        	"fileIds": []
        }
    }
        
    logger.info("Payload for CSR cert_ca_connector_info"+str(payload))

    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    logger.info("Status code : "+str(response.status_code))
    logger.info("Response REASON : "+str(response.reason))
    logger.info("Response TEXT : "+str(response.text))

    logger.info("Response code : "+str(response))
    response = response.json().get("response")
    logger.info(response)
    AVX::LOG("Response-->>"+str(response))


def check_strict_or_suggestive():
    """
    Function to Fetch the configured certificate group
    
    :return: "Strict" or "Suggestive"
    """
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    cat = 'server'
    if '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Server':
        cat = 'server'
    elif '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Client':
        cat = 'client'
    elif '<%certificate_profile%>' == 'Code Signing':
        cat = 'codeSigning'
        
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-get-policy-by-groupname?certificateGroupName={}&certificateCategory={}&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url,'<%assign_group%>', cat, gateway_key)

    headers = {"sessionId": "<%sessionId%>", "Content-Type": "application/json"}
    response = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, verify=False)
    response = response.json()
    # logger.info('&&&\n')
    # logger.info(str(response))
    
    return response.get("response").get("type")

def cert_submit_csr_hsv(uuid):
    gateway_url, gateway_key = fetch_gateway_key()
    url = "{}avxapi/cert-submit-csr-hv?&gwkey={}&gwsource=external".format(gateway_url, gateway_key)
    headers = {
        "sessionId": '<%sessionId%>',
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Accept": "application/json"
    }
    payload =  {
        "payload":{
            "certificateUuid":uuid,
            "comments":"",
            "action":"Submit",
            "submit":true
        }
    }
    
    logger.info('+++++++'+str(payload))
    response = requests.post(url=url, headers=headers, data=json.dumps(payload), verify=False)
    response = response.json()
    logger.info(response)
    return response

    certificate_group = getCertificateGroup()

    AVX::LOG("CERT GROUP")
    AVX::LOG(str(certificate_group))
    a = '<%upload_csv%>'

        reader = csv.reader(data_file, delimiter='\n')
        for row in reader:
            if c == 1:
                c+=1
                continue
            AVX::LOG(str(row))
            AVX::LOG(str(type(row)))

            csr = row[0].split(",")
            uuid = cert_ca_connector_info(csr)
            resp = cert_submit_csr_hsv(uuid)
            # fetch = cert_fetch(uuid)
            AVX::LOG("--->"+str(uuid))
